name: Remaining assets
description: Remaining assets (or liabilities) include what the ESA 95 calls “other assets receivable/payable” (AF.7), but also some other items (notably positions in financial derivatives, AF.34 in the ESA 95, and accrued interest on deposits and loans, which the ESA 95 recommends should be recorded in the appropriate sub-category of AF.2 or AF.4). As defined in BSI Manual.
